topics.body:
i hate sleeping when i dont want to.

like 1 moment i lay in bed cause im a bit tired then the other i have already lost 30 minutes of my life.

and there is a 50% chance that nap will leave me even more tired and be forced to just sleep the night, forcing to lose progress in all the stacked work i have.

fuck naps, thats all.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

i just want to evolve into a mindless drone who has lost every inch of humanity.
